New Records: Cleveland Cavaliers achieved a 15-0 win, maintaining the best record in the league
Key Match Events: Cleveland Cavaliers implemented a zone defense in the fourth quarter which was crucial for their win
The game was tight until the fourth quarter where the Cavaliers locked down defensively, holding the Hornets to 15 points
Darius Garland led the way with 25 points and 12 assists
Pre-Game Insights: Donovan Mitchell was out due to rest, making the win more significant
The Cavaliers relied on their bench and zone defense to secure the victory
Post-Match Reflections: Players and coaches praised Max Strus for his role in coordinating the zone defense
The win extended the Cavaliers' 15-0 streak, highlighting their strong performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers are the only undefeated team in the league
The game was a pivotal moment in their season as they prepare for the NBA Cup
